tools.cutie package¶

Submodules¶

tools.cutie.preprocessing module¶

tools.cutie.preprocessing.check_box_dictionnary(image_path: str, box_dict: dict)¶

Opens a new window showing the image and the boxes found in the dictionnary given as parameter.

Parameters

  • image_path (str) – path to the image

  • box_dict (dict) – dictionnary prepared with divide_boxes function

tools.cutie.preprocessing.divide_boxes(via_file: str) → dict¶

Divides the boxes containing several words in the via annotations file given a s parameter. Returns a dictionnary with the information of each box : filename, class, word, x, y, width, height.

Parameters

via_file (str) – path to the via csv file

Returns

dictionnary with the boxes information

Return type

dict
